Reviews.Title: “Parking. Checking in.”
Reviews.Author: Jen N
Reviews.Content: haven hotel okay parking horrible youll park block car towed front desk service alright wouldnt recommend staying family stayed 5th floor ice elevator floor internet access swimming pool kids

Reviews.Title: “A great hotel to stay at with a young family!”
Reviews.Author: KRepine
Reviews.Content: enjoyed hotel clean beautiful view boardwalk liked size larger hotel kitchen nice included coffee pot beds little stiff werent bed bugs time ocean city recommend hotel friends

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, Great VAlue!”
Reviews.Author: ggsmiley123
Reviews.Content: stay haven hotel magnificent checkin checkout fast easy price views clean spacious hotel parking manageable hotel didnt amenities location boardwalk midst didnt matter night sleeping beds comfortable doors blocked noise outside staff friendly accommodating loved trip defiantly returning

Reviews.Title: “Very satisfied!”
Reviews.Author: neets88
Reviews.Content: haven hotel awhile refurbished 2003 location amusements fourth floor oceanfront balcony overlooked magnificent beach amazed slider closed heard noise boardwalk clean checkin checkout effortless hotel staff pleasant accommodating 6 parking spaces steps lobby remaining parking 2 streets move car visit haven hotel wont wished booked nights seen fireworks balcony maybe

Reviews.Title: “Great location...Great price”
Reviews.Author: TKLT27
Reviews.Content: heading 5th straight daysthe location awesome boardwalk center wont price oc boards clean staff parking block pool complain am pretty happy
